channel.title: Support on Frank Doka
channel.description: Recent content in Support on Frank Doka

item.title: NYC Police Department
item.description: Description Provided IT technical support and remote assistance to end-users for computer operational and various peripheral equipment, resolving 1500+ support tickets Assigned and delegated various computer operational work to other technical units and ensured satisfactory completion of tasks. Collaborate with IT teams to ensure timely and effective resolution of technical issues and incidents.
